body:
I believe this is a dup of #16061.

It would be good to either:
1) Make the desired register portion of regalloc stronger so it handles these cases.
    Maybe just make sure that s390x is triggering desired registers at all.
2) Implement "spill to register" instead of spill to stack.  That is required for #16061, where no amount of desired register information can help, because we desire 2 different values in the same register (two DIVs that both need their args in AX).
